DOC.detailed_description: This prospective multicenter study Chinese population . Participants ( normal individual without migraine migraineurs ) include standardize diagnostic procedure ( TCD c-TCD ) . For migraineurs large RLS examination ( c-TTE brain MRI ) require . Up 10 study site nationwide need recruit plan participant population 1-year period . The information participant register , include basic fact , longitudinal headache history , frequency , location , quality , intensity , duration , accompany symptom , precipitate exacerbate factor , without aura , MIDAS HIT-6 questionnaire .
